content: Are you currently using ESR channel, which is version 128? Do you have many accounts? The release channel which is currently version 138 has an Appearance section in Settings where you can control this.
creator: wsmwk

content:
Hi Wayne, Thanks for that. I am on Version 128 which has what you said. Is there any way to simply convert existing folders? I suppose that if I deleted the entire mail content and re drew it down that may help provided I did what you say before the draw down??

Brett
creator: thebellmobers

content:
Per poter inquadrare il problema prova a fornire queste informazioni:

  1. Versione di Thunderbird
  2. Versione del sistema operativo
  3. Provider delle caselle email (Gmail, Libero, Hotmail, etc.)
  4. Tipologia di account (POP3, IMAP)
  5. Estensioni installate
  6. Messaggi di errore che vengono visualizzati durante l'utilizzo di Thunderbird
  7. Software di sicurezza eventualmente presenti (Antivirus e simili)
  8. Screenshot del problema (se utile a chiarire il contesto)
creator: @next
